welcome.desc:
I am CleverBot, a chat bot fueled by Artificial Intelligence here to engage in *meaningful* conversations.

I also work here if you would like to have uninterupted conversations.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.desc: By using this bot you agree to let me log users and the channels that I interact with. To view my full privacy notice use

getting_started_text.title: Getting Started
getting_started_text.desc: To get started, use <@463715411561807882> `bind #channel` to bind me to a channel. Then you can send any message in that channel to talk with me.

getting_started_dm.title: Getting Started
getting_started_dm.desc: To get started, in a DM Channel, just send a message that doesn't begin with

credits.title: Credits
credits.desc: View all of the open source packages CleverBot uses

settings.title: Toggle Settings
settings.desc: Toggle maintenance and donation/upvote alerts with

unbind.title: Unbind Channels
unbind.desc: You can now unbind CleverBot from a channel using

find.title: Find Channel
find.desc: Can't find the channel you bound CleverBot to? Use

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.desc: If you're ever having trouble with CleverBot, or have a suggestion you think can make CleverBot better use

privacy.title: CleverBot Privacy
privacy.desc: By using CleverBot, you agree to allowing us to log your interactions with this bot and use that data for future projects and research.
privacy.footer: Messages logged by CleverBot are anonymous and are only logged in channels CleverBot is bound to.

messages.title: ðŸ’¬ Message Logging
messages.desc: Message Content and Responses are logged for quality assurance and to make sure CleverBot is functioning correctly.

channels.title: ðŸ“º Channel Logging
channels.desc: Channel IDs and Channel Names are kept on the server to retain channel bindings.

ids.title: ðŸ‘¤ ID Logging
ids.desc: User IDs, Channel IDs, and Server/Guild IDs are logged when using the feedback command to monitor possible abuse of the command.

interactions.title: ðŸ“Ÿ Interaction Logging
interactions.desc: CleverBot interactions in bound channels are logged anonymously now. Some interactions may be posted on the CleverBot Discord Server

error.valid_channelMen: You must provide a valid Channel Mention
error.unexpected: An unexpected error occured, please send a screenshot of this, with context, to **skylarmccauley864@gmail.com** or **TheHacker#9367**:
error.noChannelID: The Channel ID must be a Snowflake (17 or 18 characters long)
error.noBoundChannel: I am not bound to a channel in this server.
error.userBlacklisted: You have been blacklisted from this command.
error.serverBlacklisted: Your server has been blacklisted from this command.
error.corruptDBFile: [CORRUPTED DB FILE DETECTED]. Please email me at **skylarmccauley864@gmail.com** with context to this error.
error.dmBind: You cannot bind CleverBot in DM Channels!
error.dmunBind: You cannot unbind CleverBot in DM Channels
error.dmFindBind: You cannot bind CleverBot in DM Channels, therefore you cannot find the bound channel in DM Channels!
error.manageChannelsPermReq: You must have the `MANAGE_CHANNELS` permission to use this command.
error.dmToggle: You cannot toggle settings in DM Channels!

lockdown.title: Lockdown In Effect
lockdown.desc: A lockdown is in effect at this time.

confirm.autoBind:
No channel was provided, so I am now bound to this channel. To unbind me from the channel use the `unbind` command.

To chat with me, just send a message in that channel and I'll respond to you.

announcementsDisabled: All announcements below *high* urgency have been disabled. You can use this command again to disable them.
announcementsEnabled: All announcements have been enabled. You can use this command again to disable them.

desc.sufficientPerms: Change whether CleverBot sends alerts after it responds to your message
desc.insufficientPerms: **NOTE**: Settings are stored per-server. To change settings you will need to have the MANAGE CHANNELS permission.

support.desc:
Send feedback to the developer, whether it be a complaint about a bug, a suggestion, or just a thumbs up.

**Any abuse of this system will result in your account or server being blacklisted.**
support.confirmation:
Feedback sent!
**NOTE:** Join the CleverBot Discord Server **https://skylarmccauley.xyz/cleverbot** so you can be contacted if needed.

support.name: support

Send a message to the developer, whether it be a complaint about a bug, a suggestion, or just a thumbs up.

**Any abuse of this system will result in your account or server being blacklisted.**
